description: Index your documents in Milvus for fast semantic search. Retrieve the most relevant passages for RAG, Q&A, and summarization. List collections and inspect their details to manage your knowledge base.

collectionName.description: Name of the collection to use for the MCP

embeddingModelName.description: Embedding model name to be used by the server

capabilities.name: ingest_documents_from_path
capabilities.description:
Load documents from a directory, split them into chunks,
embed them, and insert into a Milvus collection using LangChain.

Args:
    path: The absolute path to the directory containing documents.
    collection_name: The name of the target Milvus collection. If not provided, the default name from the server configuration will be used.
    chunk_size: The size of text chunks.
    chunk_overlap: The overlap between text chunks.
    recreate_collection: If True, the collection will be deleted and recreated.
    schema_json: Optional JSON string to define the collection schema.
    index_params_json: Optional JSON string to define the index parameters.

capabilities.name: ingest_documents_from_files
capabilities.description:
Ingest specific document files (PDF/Markdown) into a Milvus collection.

Enforces a total payload size cap of 15 MB across all provided files.

Args:
    files: Absolute file paths to ingest. Supports .pdf and .md.
    collection_name: Target collection name. Falls back to default from config.
    chunk_size: Text chunk size.
    chunk_overlap: Overlap between chunks.
    recreate_collection: If True, delete and recreate the collection.
    schema_json: Optional JSON string defining collection schema.
    index_params_json: Optional JSON string defining index parameters.

capabilities.name: vector_search
capabilities.description:
Perform a RAG search on a Milvus collection using LangChain.
Returns the most relevant document chunks with their similarity scores.

Args:
    query: The query text.
    collection_name: The name of the collection to search in. If not provided, the default name from the server configuration will be used.
    k: The number of results to return.

capabilities.name: list_collections
capabilities.description: List all collections in the database.

capabilities.name: get_collection_info
capabilities.description:
Lists detailed information about a specific collection.

Args:
    collection_name: Name of collection to inspect. If not provided, the default name from the server configuration will be used.
